title: What's the process of posting a GIF in a thread?
body:
Including saving it onto your computer, getting the correct format from imgur or whatever else website you use, and then ultimately posting it on a thread..

thanks!

replies.body: The boards doesn't have an attachment feature, so you'd have to use an external source like imgur.  Just paste it in your post, and it should auto-show (not in your preview, but after).  There also a solid[ boards formatting guide](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101) that might be useful.  Let me know if that helps!
